1 #ifndef VOXBLOX_UTILS_DISTANCE_UTILS_H_
2 #define VOXBLOX_UTILS_DISTANCE_UTILS_H_
3 
4 #include <voxblox/core/block.h>
5 #include <voxblox/core/common.h>
6 #include <voxblox/core/layer.h>
7 #include <voxblox/core/voxel.h>
8 
9 namespace voxblox {
10 
11 // Returns true if there is a valid distance (intersection with the surface),
12 // false otherwise (no known space, no surface boundary, etc.).
13 // VoxelType must have a distance defined.
14 template <typename VoxelType>
15 bool getSurfaceDistanceAlongRay(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
16  const Point& ray_origin,
17  const Point& bearing_vector,
18  FloatingPoint max_distance,
19  Point* triangulated_pose) {
20  CHECK_NOTNULL(triangulated_pose);
21  // Make sure bearing vector is normalized.
22  const Point ray_direction = bearing_vector.normalized();
23 
24  // Keep track of current distance along the ray.
25  FloatingPoint t = 0.0;
26  // General ray equations: p = o + d * t
27 
28  // Cache voxel sizes for faster moving.
29  const FloatingPoint voxel_size = layer.voxel_size();
30 
31  bool surface_found = false;
32 
33  while (t < max_distance) {
34  const Point current_pos = ray_origin + t * ray_direction;
35  typename Block<VoxelType>::ConstPtr block_ptr =
36  layer.getBlockPtrByCoordinates(current_pos);
37  if (!block_ptr) {
38  // How much should we move up by? 1 voxel? 1 block? Could be close to the
39  // block boundary though....
40  // Let's start with the naive choice: 1 voxel.
41  t += voxel_size;
42  continue;
43  }
44  const VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByCoordinates(current_pos);
45  if (voxel.weight < 1e-6) {
46  t += voxel_size;
47  continue;
48  }
49  if (voxel.distance > voxel_size) {
50  // Move forward as much as we can.
51  t += voxel.distance;
52  continue;
53  }
54  // The other cases are when we are actually at or behind the surface.
55  // TODO(helenol): these are gross generalizations; use actual interpolation
56  // to get the surface boundary.
57  if (voxel.distance < 0.0) {
58  surface_found = true;
59  break;
60  }
61  if (voxel.distance < voxel_size) {
62  // Also assume this is finding the surface.
63  surface_found = true;
64  t += voxel.distance;
65  break;
66  }
67  // Default case...
68  t += voxel_size;
69  }
70 
71  if (surface_found) {
72  *triangulated_pose = ray_origin + t * ray_direction;
73  }
74 
75  return surface_found;
76 }
77 
78 } // namespace voxblox
79 
80 #endif // VOXBLOX_UTILS_DISTANCE_UTILS_H_
